pages.text:
A Unique and Special Event Venue
We’re ready to host your special event! Bowling is perfect for every celebration—from graduations, corporate events, reunions, to retirement parties. You name it. When you want to bring together people together with a fun activity, Pin Chasers answers the call.
Bowl, play, and celebrate!
Ready to celebrate? Pin Chasers loves to make your special event a 100% crowd-pleaser. Bring together co-workers, families, old college friends or new teams of all ages and interests. Pin Chasers is perfect for a fun time together, and gives everyone the chance to show off their strike skills! Enjoy our awesome video games and pool tables, too.
Corporate Events
When you bring co-workers or new teams together, an afternoon at Pin Chasers turns them into new friends. Your host will make sure that your team gets personalized service, and that your event moves smoothly. We will dedicate a party planner to you so that you get to make the perfect format for your corporate event!
Bowling Graduation Parties
Celebrate your graduate with a super fun bowling party. We’ll take care of decorations, food and drink, and set up an awesome graduation party. Invite fellow graduates and parents for a grand time together, letting off steam after all that hard work. Make your high school or college graduation great at Pin Chasers.
Reunions
School reunions, family reunions… any kind of reunion calls for great food and drink, and a party atmosphere. Pin Chasers is your ultimate reunion celebration venue. Getting everyone in one place is a big enough accomplishment. Let us take care of the party planning. All you have to do is turn up and have fun! A great time bowling together, while enjoying delicious food and drink, is the perfect way to reconnect after time apart. We’re thrilled to be the place where bonds are made stronger!
Make any occasion extra special!
Whatever your occasion, Pin Chasers party planners are pros at making your event special. We make the best bang for your buck for all sizes and budgets. Decorate, go galactic, or go to town on our awesome menu. Any way you want to make your event uniquely yours, we are ready to go!
.entry-content
